2099190.name: Edge Of The End
2099190.description:
Edge Of The End is a Short Walking Simulator, Emotional 3D FPS Exploration Game, Where You Play as a young boy who is going back to his beloved boyhood refuge as you go on an emotional trip. Uncover a treasury of love-filled and heartbreaking experiences that are intertwined. Get lost in the complex web of regrets and desire that makes up familial ties. Explore a moving tale as the son navigates the echoes of the past in his quest for closure. Are you prepared to engage in this sincere adventure and see the power of emotions? Unravel the tale to leave you with lasting memories when the voyage is over.

KEY FEATURES
  • Emotional and Heart warming story
  • Explore the beautiful nature
  • Search For Family Memories
  • Short walking simulator experience
  • Explore Houses
2099190.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
